Reviews.Title: “Not VIP at all”
Reviews.Author: LudmilaT
Reviews.Content: stayed nine nights worst hotels i’ve water shower cold western standards sheets towels washed leaks ceiling internet charged 3 singapore dollars day stopped day hotel close main tourist attractions 15 minute walk subway station

Reviews.Content: stayed vip hotel location walking distance buses orchard road hotel located quiet residential peaceful staff friendly pleased help size spotlessly clean tea coffee facilities toiletries

Reviews.Title: “Family stay at VIP hotel, Singapore.”
Reviews.Author: ManishSahdev
Reviews.Content: family adults kids stayed vip hotel 07 13 dec 11 deluxe location hotel located quiet posh residential singapore sleepless nights due road traffic noise etcthe balmoral plaza hotel restaurants stores 711 medicine etc newton mrt stn 7 min walk children bus stand 4 min road spacious generous extra bed family lives easy air con decent linen sparkling clean changed day towels etc carpet change bathroom clean hygienic fridge electric kettle tea bags etc lcd tv iron demand telephone buffet cozy breakfast pretty basic guess holiday budget ok pool buffet comes handy relax tiring day holidaying cabs easily accessible reception cons cold behaviour staff reception limited drinking water litres day tea sachets 1012 channels tv provided free internet suggestions improve breakfast add fruits etc provide atleast 1 lit drinking water individual day provide increased amount tea sachets provide wifi internet access free cost overall highly recommended family holiday spend tourist attractions accomodation

Reviews.Title: “An Oasis in a sea of glitz and busy activity!”
Reviews.Author: datul_lamak
Reviews.Content: weve vacationing singapore decade found stay huge 27 sq meters downtown priced 9 staff talk jobs pleasure utter quietness night situated upscale neighborhood tiny street traffic cocoon peacefulness stability established inn 1973 remodels complete run real innkeeper designed lodgings guests endure feels sort inns visited time people cared yes cab sights cheap mrt 10 minutes foot yes handful restaurants ranging cheap fabulous expensive 5 minutes foot upscale grocers pool builtin jets ease aching muscles walking little india cost windowless cubicles downtown hidden costs tricky fine print stay else vip

Reviews.Title: “cold and unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: nila99
Reviews.Content: vip disappointment centrally located 20 mins orchard rd breakfast served unappetizing rationed prevailed singapore card key didnt function properly night wing hotel suddenly plunged darkness short circuit wing leave door inquired reception male staff rude provide candle torch wait corridor hours feel safe hotel cant pay money grumpy cold hotel staff welcoming smile staff financial investment management fortunately stayed 2 days

Reviews.Title: “Cheap for Singapore but could do with a revamp”
Reviews.Author: Marl56
Reviews.Content: hotel ok exceptional clean faded round edges revamp pool rebuilt booked pool disappointing bit false advertising receptionist encountered uninterested care ourselves breakfast little variety stayed night staying singapore moved elsewhere
